name: NursingFacilityVisit
title: Nursing Facility Visit
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters in a nursing facility.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter specific to a nursing facility, including skilled, intermediate and long term care facilities.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent an encounter other than a nursing facility visits.)

concept.display: History and physical examination with evaluation and management of nursing facility patient (procedure)

contains.display: History and physical examination with evaluation and management of nursing facility patient (procedure)
